column5: Has anyone fished the St.Lawrence River east of the Kingston Ontario ?
yup. I live in the area, wutcha looking for?
all the time, took a few 'eyes' last night under a bright moon fish will bite strong for next two days..... Cheers Spenc
Thanks for responding. I sent you both PMs.
Looking for launch ramp locations and maybe a local baitshop or two. Either side of the river, but mostly looking at the Ontario side.
